My work ethic and growth mindset leverage my skills in web development making me capable and reliable in any position.  Thank you!

projects.title: Bible Commentary
projects.description: An app I deployed overnight to help my bible study group. The goal is for users to temporarily add their ideas into a neatly organized and accessible place. It does it's job quite well!

projects.title: Poke Catch
projects.description: Personal project I wrote to learn and practice solving many developer problems! Users can log in, and save their progress catching pokemon in the wild!

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
